Description: AVAILABLE JULY 1ST, Beach front one bedroom apartment right in front of L street beach. The apartment is facing directly in front of the beach and has direct water views from the living room. It has an alley kitchen with an open concept to the living room. The bedroom can easily fit a queen sized bed, a dresser, night stand and a desk. It, also has hardwood floors throughout and has good ceiling height. Also in close proximity to Broadway street where you'll find plenty of bars and restaurants like Locos, Lincoln, Capo, and many more.
